interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MainBasics Headband with Buttons for Face Masks (Gray)
Review Date: 2020/06/14
Store: MainBasics
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'MainBasics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 3.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '790887351233'}
Review Text: It is a soft material headband and it is comfortable to wear. You do need to make sure the headband is flat against your head or your mask elastic will keep popping off the buttons though. It does give your ears a break if you have to wear a mask all day. I wish the buttons were more firmly sewn in place though.
Review Title: Works
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask 4ea (1box) 25g - 77% Pure Collagen Extract Anti-Aging Total Care Facial Mask Sheet, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle Night Skin Care Samyang {'Brand': 'Samyang', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} Pros: I had noticeably firmer skin after one use. It was cold and relaxing.

Cons: The instructions on how to use are in Chinese. It's is a little difficult to position as the mask itself feels very much like slimy loose skin. My face turned red - but I do have very sensitive skin.

Overall I was happy with the tighter looking skin. You will definitely look like something out of a horror movie when you wear this face mask so don't wear it around small children (see picture). Works Mens Sea Facial Detox Facial Mask Sheet for Oily Skin- New Skincare - Blackhead, Pore Cleansing, Peel-off (Age under 35) SeptCity {'Brand': 'SeptCity', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Detoxifying', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '733424600616'} I was skeptical when I first opened the pouch for this mask and found a dry sheet that seemingly was just a paper towel with cut outs but when I followed the directions and soaked it in water for a minute it became thick and almost skin like. I suggest when you place it in water to soak it unfolded and flat if possible because I had just added water to the pouch and let it soak folded in that and it was difficult to unfold. The eye holes and mouth holes were a bit too small for me so I will likely cut the holes bigger before soaking next time. Overall it did hydrate my skin some but not to the point where I wouldn't need to use moisturizer as I still had some dry patches. I did not experience any redness from this and for the rest of the day my skin has felt tighter. I prefer the sheer masks that come pre mositened mostly because it saves me a step but it does do what it says it will do. Hydrates ok MainBasics Headband with Buttons for Face Masks (Gray) MainBasics {'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'MainBasics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 3.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '790887351233'} It is a soft material headband and it is comfortable to wear. You do need to make sure the headband is flat against your head or your mask elastic will keep popping off the buttons though. It does give your ears a break if you have to wear a mask all day. I wish the buttons were more firmly sewn in place though. Works
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong interest in skincare, particularly in anti-aging products and hydrating solutions. They are also exploring detoxifying masks, favoring the convenience of sheet masks. However, a recent interaction with a product requiring additional preparation indicates a possible shift towards considering more complex methods. The user has sensitive skin, which continues to influence product choices; notably, they experienced no irritation from a new product, suggesting slight improvement in tolerance towards diverse formulations.

Efficacy is paramount, with a preference for products that deliver hydration and skin-tightening effects, though they still seek moisture post-application. Sensory aspects such as scent and texture remain important, but usability concerns have arisen regarding dry sheet structures. They prioritize cruelty-free items, echoing a commitment to ethical sourcing.

Clear instructions are valued, with an emphasized need for simplicity, especially for products requiring preparation. Recent purchases include practical accessories that enhance the mask-wearing experience, reflecting a growing focus on comfort during application routines. Despite their exploration of new products, the user remains cautious of potential discomfort and adverse reactions, favoring options that minimize skin irritation while ensuring effectiveness. Overall, the user’s profile highlights a consistent pursuit of effective, gentle skincare aligned with their sensitive skin concerns, alongside an interest in practical and ethical products.
